===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[advance]]; to [[move forward]]
# to [[enter]]; to [[go]] [[into]]; to [[come]] [[into]]
#* {{zh-x|一 個 女孩 '''進''' 了 房間|a girl '''came into''' the room}}
# {{qualifier|used after a verb}} [[into]]; [[in]]
#* {{zh-x|她 把 買 來 的 東西 裝 '''進''' 了 轎車。|She loaded her shopping '''into''' the car.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 把 我 叫 '''進''' 他 的 辦公室。|He called me '''into''' his office.}}
# to [[receive]]; to [[admit]]; to [[recruit]]
# to [[give]], to [[offer]] {{qualifier|advice}}
#* {{zh-x|我 給 你 '''進''' 一 句 忠告 吧。|Let me '''give''' you a piece of advice.}}
# {{qualifier|used with {{zh-l|球}}}} to [[score]] a [[goal]]
#* {{zh-l|進球|to score a goal}}
#* {{zh-x|他 踢 '''進''' 了 一 個 球。|He kicked a goal.}}
# to [[eat]]; to [[drink]]
#* {{zh-l|進食|to take a meal}}
#* {{zh-l|進餐|to have a meal}}
# [[measure word]] for [[row]]s of [[houses]] within an old-style residential [[compound]]
